channel.title: Quran Podcast
channel.description: A podcast that recites the Quran with beautiful recitations by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy.

item.title: Surah Al-Fatiha (The Opening) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha (The Opening) with 7 verses. This Surah is often recited in daily prayers.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Fatiha - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Listen to the beautiful recitation of Surah Al-Fatiha by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy, consisting of 7 verses.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow) with 286 verses. The longest Surah in the Quran.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Baqarah - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Baqarah (The Cow), the longest Surah of the Quran, containing 286 verses. This Surah provides guidance and wisdom for all aspects of life.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) with 4 verses. A declaration of God's oneness.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Ikhlas - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Listen to the recitation of Surah Al-Ikhlas (The Sincerity) by Sheikh Mishary Alafasy. This Surah emphasizes the oneness of Allah.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network

item.title: Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak) - Arabic Recitation
item.description: Recitation of Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak) with 5 verses. A Surah that seeks protection from evil.
item.author: Sheikh Mishary Alafasy
item.itunes:subtitle: Surah Al-Falaq - Recitation
item.itunes:summary: Recitation of Surah Al-Falaq (The Daybreak), seeking protection from the evil of creation.
item.itunes:author: Islamic Network
